title: The PERFECT Minecraft Gaming PC
description: Today we build the ultimate Minecraft streaming and speedrun gaming PC! Big thank you to Saxs Persson and @Couriway for the help on this one! Get a Free Pair of Wireless Bluetooth Headphones at Micro Center:  Check out the Micro Center Community Quest:    The Ultimate Minecraft Setup:  AMD Ryzen 9 5900X:  Gigabyte B550 AORUS MASTER Motherboard:  Gigabyte NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3080 Ti Gaming Overclocked Graphics Card:  G.Skill Trident Z Neo Series RGB 32GB (2 x 16GB) DDR4-3600 PC4-28800 CL18:  Crucial P5 1TB NVMe SSD:  WD Blue Mainstream 4TB 5400RPM 3.5" Internal Hard Drive:  NZXT Kraken Z73 360mm CPU Water Cooling Kit w/ LCD Display:  PowerSpec 750 Watt 80 Plus Gold ATX Fully Modular Power Supply:  Lian Li PC-O11 Dynamic Tempered Glass eATX Full Tower Computer Case  Green:  Corsair LL120 RGB 120mm Case Fan with Lighting Node Pro - Triple Pack:  Corsair Lighting Node PRO RGB LED Controller Kit:  Inland PSU Sleeved Cable Extension Kit - Black/ Red:  Razer Huntsman V2 Analog Gaming Keyboard Chroma RGB:  Razer Naga X Ergonomic MMO Gaming Mouse with 16 Programmable Buttons:  Razer BlackShark V2 Pro Wireless Gaming Headset:  Razer Goliathus Extended Chroma Gaming Mouse Pad:  LG UltraGear 32GP850-B 32" QHD 165Hz Monitor:    Best PC for Minecraft   The Budget Minecraft Setup:  Intel Core i5-11400:  Gigabyte B560M DS3H Intel LGA 1200 microATX Motherboard:  Gigabyte GeForce GTX 1650 Super Windforce Graphics Card:  G.Skill Ripjaws V 16GB (2 x 8GB) DDR4-3200 PC4-25600 CL16:  Crucial P5 500GB NVMe SSD:  EVGA 500 Watt 80 Plus ATX Non-Modular Power Supply:  NZXT H510 Tempered Glass ATX Mid-Tower Computer Case  Black:  Seagate 1TB USB 3.1 (Gen 1 Type-A) 2.5" Portable External Hard Drive  Black:  Razer Cynosa V2 Chroma RGB Membrane Gaming Keyboard:  Razer Naga X Ergonomic MMO Gaming Mouse with 16 Programmable Buttons:  Razer Kraken X Wired Gaming Headset:  Razer Goliathus Mobile Stealth Edition Gaming Mouse Mat:  LG 22MK430H-B 21.5" 75Hz Monitor:   My new podcast @TheBackmarkers!  I have a TikTok!  My Twitch channel:  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:

Like, because you're looking below ground too.
